simplify production of EG fit using eu_data_cache_data

Source: R/easyEG.R
easyEG_eucache.Rd

simplify production of EG fit using eu_data_cache_data

easyEG_eucache(gt, filt, src, start_date, end_date)

Arguments

gt

output of R0::generation.time
filt

an expression selecting a region, like nuts_3 == "Bergamo"
src

instance of eu_data_cache_data(), which will be run if this is missing
start_date

string in form yyyy-mm-dd
end_date

string in form yyyy-mm-dd

Examples

gt = R0::generation.time("gamma", c(3.5, 4.8))
run1 = easyEG_eucache(gt, nuts_3=="Bergamo", start_date="2020-02-20",
  end_date="2020-03-15")
#> Waiting for profiling to be done...
plot(run1)
est_R0(run1)
#> [1] 1.947762
low_R0(run1)
#> [1] 1.901913
hi_R0(run1)
#> [1] 1.994623
